title: Sri Lanka CB Governor doing extremely good job in dire times: Coomaraswamy
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s central bank Governor Nandalal Weerasinghe is doing an extremely good job in difficult circumstances, ex-Central Bank Governor Indrajit Coomaraswamy said.
“Dr Nandalal Weerasinghe is doing an extremely  good job in dire circumstances,” Coomaraswamy said.
Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe had made any request him to return to the central bank, he said.
There has been speculation in some quarters that Coomaraswamy may return as Governor.
Ex-Governor Coomaraswamy is already involved in supporting Sri Lanka’s debt restricting and recovery efforts.
Governor Weerasinghe has raised rates and is involved in fashioning a program with the International Monetary Fund with Treasury Secretary Mahinda Siriwardene.  (Colombo/May25/2022)
